text: Welcome Home is a World War I song written by Bud Green and composed by Edward G. Nelson. The song was first published in 1918 by A.J. Stasny Music Co., in New York, NY. The sheet music cover depicts soldiers being welcomed home by men and women. The sheet music can be found at the Pritzker Military Museum & Library.Nelson, Ed G., and Bud Green. 1918.
